def_cn: 穿着衣服的;穿着整齐的
def_en: If you are dressed, you are wearing clothes rather than being naked or wearing your night clothes. If you get dressed, you put on your clothes.  →see usage note at:wear
See also:well-dressed; If you are dressed in a particular way, you are wearing clothes of a particular colour or kind.

def_cn: 打扮得引人注目;打扮得花枝招展;衣着光鲜
def_en: If someone is dressed to kill, they are wearing very smart or fashionable clothes because they want people to notice them and think they are attractive.
